title: Mobile Microlearning Based on Pharmacy Compounding Skill Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational pharmaceutical knowledge and understanding of dispensing procedures
context.additional_context: Web-based simulation learning environment for enhancing compounding skills of current practitioners. Applied under limited-technology conditions centered on smartphones in PC-unavailable settings.

learning_goals: Learners can perform medication dispensing according to prescriptions with 90% accuracy
Learners can apply dispensing safety verification procedures including drug interaction and side effect checks
Learners can complete patient counseling simulations at least 3 times in virtual pharmacy environments and incorporate feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
